Name: Torrent Elemental
Story Background: Born from the tumultuous energies of the sea, the Torrent Elemental surges forth to manifest the spirit of the ocean itself.
Ability: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant) and Flying
Appearance Description: A swirling mass of churning water takes the form of a majestic, elemental being, with waves crashing and turbulent energy emanating from every pore.
